segments.text: I haven't seen your father in like 5 years . How is he doing ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: About a year ago , he started feeling weak all the time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is it due to old age or is he sick .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maybe a little of both . The doctor's can't point out anything specifically . I think it is because he didn't take care of himself during his youth .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That makes sense . It's important to take care of your health early in life .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's what my father tells me almost everyday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I hope he starts feeling better . Say hi to him for me .
segments.speaker: S1
